reviews.review: Игра вообщем-то нормально если бы не было столько читеров . Попадаются даже на прайме и из-за этого +- упал онлайн самой кски

CSGO: A game where your player doesn't get better, it's a game where YOU get better. For the completely uninitiated I will warn you that the skill gap between this game and normal shooters is a little larger & for this reason, it is much better than any other modern FPS you will ever play.

More on that later.

This game will suck many valuable hours from your existence & at times you will never feel like playing... however, you will inevitably end up playing this game again and again. Once it has you sucked in, there's no turning back. do not underestimate how easy it is to dedicate thousands of hours of your life to this game.

What makes it better than other FPS?
Your aim in this game is not only one of the most important part of this game, but it's also one of the smallest parts in comparison to the scope of the rest of the game. Allow me to explain: You learn very quickly that succeeding in this game revolves around working with teammates, learning chokepoints, prefire angles, hundreds of nade positions, rotation times, positional awareness which will help give you the advantage, not to mention the movement and shooting mechanics which are extremely important to master.

Succeeding in this game is one of the most satisfying feelings you, as a human being, can feel. Clutching a round, Aceing the enemy team, successfully executing a bombsite, or perfectly reading an enemy strat are all ways of which this game will make you feel like the time that you have sunk in is worth every moment.

One must be wary however of CSGO's competitive nature, I cannot begin to explain how much this game has affected my outside spending behaviour. To become the best, you need a high refresh rate monitor, a gaming mouse within the remit of 60-80 grams, mechanical keyboard, gaming chair, gaming mousepad, a high-end headset, perfectly tweaked settings and a powerful pc to power everything. Not to mention skins, so much money spent on skins. So be aware of this when making your purchase.
